overview: Charity (India Summer), and stepdaughter Jessica (Whitney Wright) pull up to their new life with Charity's new husband. Eager to be out of the place they once were, it proves a sensitive topic for bitchy and physically abusive mother Charity. But secrets are only so secret in a small world, and her spying new step-son Robby Echo soon learns everything she's trying to bury.
title: A Mother's Choice
